The Authority in its 71s Meeting held on 2.2009 has approved following norms for sanction of technical posts in respect of BOT works: SL No Post Activity Norms for BOT prolects (Unit: Length _in kms) GM Field Construction IO00 Maintenance 2000 Feasibility StudYIDPR 2000 GM Hqs Construction IO00 Maintenance 2000 Feasibility StudyIDPR 2000 DGM Field Construction 500 Maintenance 1000 Feasibility StudYIDPR IO00 DGM Hqs Construction 1000 Maintenance I000 Feasibility StudYIDPR 1O00 ManagerAM Fleld Construction 200 Maintenance 500 Feasibility StudYIDPR 500 ManagerIAM Hqs Construction 500 Maintenance 500 Feasibility StudYIDPR 500 2_ The above norms may strictly be adhered to while creation of technical posts. 3_ This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority: (Rakesh Nagar) General Manager (HR) AIl Officers at Hqs.
